post.description: Updates the 'denumire' (name) of a company document in the 'firme' Solr core using its ID.

company.description: The new name for the company

200.description: Company name successfully updated

400.description: Missing id or company parameter

500.description: Solr request failed or server misconfiguration

put.summary: Add or update a company in Solr
put.description: Inserts or updates a company document in the 'firme' Solr core. Validates required fields, email, phone, and website formats.

id.description: Unique integer ID of the company

200.description: Data successfully inserted into Solr

400.description: Validation error or missing required fields

200.description: Company successfully deleted

400.description: Missing ID

500.description: Solr request failed or server misconfiguration

get.description: Retrieves all companies from the 'firme' core that match the specified brand name.

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description: Brand name to search for in the 'brands' field of the firme core.

200.description: Successful operation. Returns a list of companies matching the given brand.

400.description: Bad Request. Missing or invalid 'brand' parameter.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Solr request failed or configuration missing.

post.summary: Add brand(s) to a company document
post.description: Adds one or more brands to the 'brands' field of a company in the 'firme' Solr core.

id.description: Solr document ID of the company.

brands.description: List of brands to add to the company.

200.description: Brand(s) successfully added to the company document.

400.description: Bad Request. Missing id or brands parameter.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Solr request failed or configuration missing.

delete.summary: Remove brand(s) from a company document
delete.description: Removes one or more brands from the 'brands' field of a company in the 'firme' Solr core.

id.description: Solr document ID of the company.

brands.description: List of brand names to remove from the company.

200.description: Brand(s) successfully removed from the company document.

400.description: Bad Request. Missing id or brands parameter.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Solr request failed or configuration missing.
